name: UIModalPresentationStyle
desc: Modal presentation styles available when presenting view controllers.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: The default presentation style chosen by the system.

items.name: case none
items.desc: A presentation style that indicates no adaptations should be made.

items.name: case fullScreen
items.desc: A presentation style in which the presented view covers the screen.

items.name: case pageSheet
items.desc: A presentation style that partially covers the underlying content.

items.name: case formSheet
items.desc: A presentation style that displays the content centered in the screen.

items.name: case currentContext
items.desc: A presentation style where the content is displayed over another view controller’s content.

items.name: case custom
items.desc: A custom view presentation style that is managed by a custom presentation controller and one or more custom animator objects.

items.name: case overFullScreen
items.desc: A view presentation style in which the presented view covers the screen.

items.name: case overCurrentContext
items.desc: A presentation style where the content is displayed over another view controller’s content.

items.name: case popover
items.desc: A presentation style where the content is displayed in a popover view.

items.name: case blurOverFullScreen
items.desc: A presentation style that blurs the underlying content before displaying new content in a full-screen presentation.
